data.title: Pattern Energy
data.meta_description: We develop, construct, own and operate high-quality wind, solar, transmission, and energy storage projects worldwide.
data.text:
“We’re in an economy-wide transformation where decarbonizing our energy systems is imperative and is a goal aligned with Pattern’s mission to transition the world to renewable energy.”

Hunter Armistead CEO, Pattern Energy

The urgency of accelerating our world’s transition from fossil energy to a sustainable future has never been clearer and our development pipeline contains bold initiatives that can help us transition at scale.

Hunter Armistead CEO, Pattern Energy
